heroes.name: Aisling
heroes.title: Young Warrior
heroes.description: By taking up her father's sword, Aisling conjured more than just his memory

skillInfo.name: Slash
skillInfo.description: Melee attack combo, 3 hits.

skillInfo.name: Sir Cador
skillInfo.description: Fights alongside Aisling. Deals +200% damage to SLASH victims.

t1.name: Spectral Wave
t1.description: Shoots a piercing projectile instead of melee attack.

t2.name: Spectral Might
t2.description: On ally hit, gives +15% damage to that ally for 5s.

t2.name: Spectral Defense
t2.description: On ally hit, gives +20 armor of ally for 5s.

t1.name: Father's Lessons
t1.description: Deals +25% damage to SIR CADOR's victims.

t2.name: Father's Flame
t2.description: Deals +60 damage on burning enimies.

t2.name: Father's Reproof
t2.description: Each hit weakens enemines, -5% damage for 3s. Stacks 5x, up to -25% damage.

skillInfo.name: Cador's Commands
skillInfo.description: Summons SIR CADOR or while summoned, directs him to target area or enemy. With SIR CADOR in sword, gains +10 armor.

skillInfo.name: Sir Cador
skillInfo.description: Fights alongside Aisling. On death, enters sword and stuns you for 1s (interrupts).
skillInfo.effect: On death, enters sword and stuns for 1s (interrupts)

t1.name: Cador's Defenses
t1.description: Gives +10 armor to allies and Aisling within 5m.

t2.name: Cador's Might
t2.description: Gives +10 armor and +15% damage to allies and Aisling within 5m.

t2.name: Cador's Restoration
t2.description: Heals allies and Aisling within 5m, +35 HP/s.

t1.name: Cador's Charge
t1.description: Every 9s, deals +50% damage with next attack.

t2.name: Fast Recharge
t2.description: Every 3s, deals +50% damage with next attack.

t2.name: Burning Blade
t2.description: Every 9s, deals +50% damage and applies burning with next attakc, 40 dmg/s for 3s
t2.effect: +50% damage next attack (9s) and burning 40 dmg/s for 3s

skillInfo.name: Cador's War Cry
skillInfo.description: Activates SIR CADOR's ability.

skillInfo.name: Sir Cador
skillInfo.description: Sir Cador roars, 3.5m radius
skillInfo.effect: -40% move speed for 2s and cancels enemies (interrupts)

t1.name: Spectral Barrier
t1.description: Blocks enemy projectiles for 2s

t2.name: Spectral Armor
t2.description: Gives +20 armor to allies for 2s

t2.name: Spectral Lens
t2.description: Gives +100% crit chance to allies and Aisling for 2s

t1.name: Chastise
t1.description: On cancel, cripples enemy, -40% move speed for 3s

t2.name: Intimidation
t2.description: On cancel, cripples and major weakness enemines, -40% move speed and -50% damage for 3s

t2.name: Cry More
t2.description: On cancel, reduces cooldown by 6s

skillInfo.name: Into The Blade
skillInfo.description: Retreats SIR CADOR into the sword. Healths self, +100 HP. On retreat, gains +10 armor till summoned again. On retreat, puts CADOR's COMMAND's and CADOR's WAR CRY's on cooldown based on SIR CADOR's health, ranges from 8s to 14s
skillInfo.effect: +100 HP and +10 armor until summoned again 8s to 14s cooldown on CADOR's COMMAND's and CADOR's WAR CRY's

t1.name: Shielding Presence
t1.description: Restores +250 shield for 4s.

t2.name: Aura of Healing
t2.description: Heals self and allies within 3m, +200 HP.

t2.name: Pure of Spirit
t2.description: Gives debuff immunity to self and allies within 4m for 4s. Excludes interrupts.
t2.effect: Debuff immunity to self and allies within 4m for 4s

t1.name: Swift Return
t1.description: Restores +20 stamina. Allows SPRINT while casting.

t2.name: Spirited Run
t2.description: Gains +25% move speed for 4s

t2.name: Ardent Blade
t2.description: Gains +25% basic attack damage for 4s

skillInfo.name: Terrify
skillInfo.description: Teleports SIR CADOR to target area. Launches enemies near target, 4.5m high (interrupts). Slows enemies near target, -20% move speed. Major weakens enemies near target, -50% damage. Each focus point increases: Slow and major weakness duration, 4s/6s/8s. Attack damage, 400/500/600
skillInfo.effect: Launches enemies near target, 4.5m high (interrupts) -20% move speed -50% damage. Focus points increase Slow and major weakness duration, 4s/6s/8s. Attack damage, 400/500/600

t1.name: Skirmishing
t1.description: In combat, restores 25 stamina/s. Outside combat, starts health regen 2s earlier.
t1.effect: 25 stamina/s outside of combat health regen 2s earlier

t2.name: Pure Escapism
t2.description: Once every 20s, DODGE purifies debuffs.

t2.name: Hit and Run
t2.description: Gains +10% move speed and +10 armor till death.
t2.effect: +10% move speed and +10 armor till death

t1.name: Ghostly Might
t1.description: SIR CADOR gains +10% damage. With SIR CADOR in sword, basic attack deals 123 damage.
t1.effect: +10% damage with SIR CADOR in sword, basic attacks deals 123 damage

t2.name: En Garde
t2.description: During attack, gains +20% front damage reduction.

t2.name: Will to Power
t2.description: Gains +10% damage and +10% front damage reduction till death.
t2.effect: +10% damage and +10% front damage reduction till death

talents.name: Command Performance
talents.description: SIR CADOR deals +40% damage on SLASH victims.

talents.name: Total Recall
talents.description: SIR CADOR deals +40% damage on SLASH victims.

heroes.name: Beckett
heroes.title: Tactical Shooter
heroes.description: An adventurer needs quick reflexes and quicker wits. A jetpack doesn't hurt either.

skillInfo.name: Fire Weapon
skillInfo.description: Shoots with equipped weapon. Each shot consumes ammo.

skillInfo.name: Machine Pistols
skillInfo.description: Fires machine pistols while equipped. Holds up to 30 ammo. Deals reduced damage on long ranged shots.

t1.name: Sharp Shooter
t1.description: Fires in rapid bursts of 5 shots

t2.name: Painfully Accurate
t2.description: Gains +10% crit damage

t2.name: Tactical Shooter
t2.description: On backstab hit, deals +15% damage

t1.name: Clip Service
t1.description: Machine Pistol gains more ammo. Holds up to 42 ammo

t2.name: Close Quarters
t2.description: On hit within 10m, deals +10% damage

t2.name: AP 'em
t2.description: Deals 30% armor ignoring damage

skillInfo.name: Grenade
skillInfo.description: Thows a grenade, causing a 4m radious explosion.

t1.name: Tear Gas
t1.description: Throws a grenade that bounces 3x. On bounce, creates poison clouds for 3s. Clouds poison enemies, -50% healing and 21dmg/s for 3s. On direct hit, cancels enemy. (interrupts)
t1.effect: On bounce, creates poison clouds for 3s that negates -50% healing and 21dmg/s for 3s. On direct hit cancels enemy.

t2.name: Lingering Fumes
t2.description: On bounce, creates poison clouds for 6s. On direct hit, dazes enemy for 1.5s. (interrupts)
t2.effect: Increases poison cloud duration. On hit, dazes.

t2.name: Exhaust Fumes
t2.description: On JETPACK use, reduces cooldown by 10s.

t1.name: Crack Troops
t1.description: Applies cracked armor, -10 armor and 10dmg/s for 3s.

t2.name: Frag Grenade
t2.description: Throws a grenade, causing a 5m radius explosion.

t2.name: Smart Grenade
t2.description: On direct hit, explodes instantly, dealing +100 damage.
t2.effect: On direct hit, explodes instantly, duffing damage.

skillInfo.name: Swap Weapon
skillInfo.description: Switches between MACHINE PISTOLS and CANNON.

skillInfo.name: Cannon
skillInfo.description: Fires cannon while equipped. Holds up to 3 ammo.

t1.name: Flame Cannon
t1.description: Applies burn, 20dmg/s for 3s.
t1.effect: Reduces CANNON range and applies burn.

t2.name: After Burner
t2.description: Pierces through enemies.

t2.name: Blast Radius
t2.description: On impact, shots explode.

t1.name: Rocket Booster
t1.description: Fast projectiles.
t1.effect: Increases CANNON projectile speed and range.

t2.name: Arming Time
t2.description: Increases damage up to 15% within the span of 30m.

t2.name: Fully Loaded
t2.description: After reload, next shot deals +100.
t2.effect: After reload, increases next CANNON damage.

skillInfo.name: Jetpack
skillInfo.description: Files with jetpack for 4s. Can jump 1x while flying.

t1.name: Rocketpack
t1.description: SPRINT + [E]: Starts flight with a dash.
t1.effect: SPRINT + [E]: Starts flight with a dash.

t2.name: Ignition Switch
t2.description: Creates a trail of fire for 2s, dealing 50 burn damage for 1s.
t2.effect: SPRINT + [E]: Creates a trail of fire, dealing burn damage.

t2.name: Blast Away
t2.description: Pushes enemies 10 away. (interrupts)

t1.name: Fuel Capacity
t1.description: [E] Flies with jetpack for 6s.

t2.name: Up and Away
t2.description: Can jump 2x while flying.

t2.name: Jet Powered
t2.description: FIRE WEAPON gains +15% damage while flying.
t2.effect: Buffs FIRE WEAPON damage while flying.

skillInfo.name: Air Strike
skillInfo.description: Drops 3 missiles in target area. Ecah focus point increases: Missle damage, 250/325/400 per missile.
skillInfo.effect: Focus increases missle damage 250/325/400 per missile.

t1.name: Will to Power
t1.description: Gains +10% damage and +10% front damage reduction until death.

t2.name: Supreme Will
t2.description: Gains 100% crit chance. Restores +100 stamina.
t2.effect: Increases crit chance and restores stamina.

t2.name: Refocus
t2.description: Gains +25% focus gain until death. Passive: Gains +15% focus gain.
t2.effect: Buffs focus gain more. Passive: Increases focus gain.

t1.name: Precision
t1.description: Gains +25% crit chance build-up.

t2.name: Tactical Awareness
t2.description: Gains 10% backstab damage reduction and +10% backstab damage.
t2.effect: Passive: Increases damage reduction and damage.

t2.name: En Garde
t2.description: During attack, gains +20% front damage reduction.
t2.effect: Passive: During attack, gains damage reduction.

talents.name: Outgunned
talents.clash: Gains +15% basic attack damage for 3s instead.
talents.effect: SWAP WEAPON buffs basic attack damage.

talents.name: Ready to Jet
talents.effect: Restores +25 stamina CLASH: While flying, gains +100% focus gain

heroes.name: Charknok
heroes.title: Fire Mage
heroes.description: The drakkor wield fire with the skills of mages and the ferocity of monsters.
